name: IPFS
summary: Peer-to-peer content delivery network with 280,000+ nodes. Files identified by cryptographic hash, not location.

name: GunDB
summary: Decentralized graph database with offline-first design and sophisticated conflict resolution (HAM algorithm).

name: Holochain
summary: Distributed app framework where the community itself functions as infrastructure. No global consensus needed.

name: Polkadot
summary: Enables different blockchains to transfer messages and value in a trust-free fashion via shared security.

name: Matrix
summary: Open network for secure, decentralized communication. Powers Element and government communications.

name: Mastodon
summary: Part of the Fediverse using ActivityPub protocol. Millions of users across interoperable instances.

name: Nostr
summary: Cryptographic identity with relay-based architecture. Growing ecosystem of decentralized social apps.

name: Syncthing
summary: Continuous file synchronization between devices without central server. Encrypted transfers, cross-platform.
